max = 10**5
a = [True]*max
prime = []
for i in range(2,max):
    if a[i]:
        prime.append(i)
        j = 2*i
        while j < max:
            a[j] = False
            j += i
n = input()
for z in range(n):
    k = input()
    count = 0
    track = 0
    while track < len(prime) and k!=1:
        while k%prime[track] == 0:
            count += 1
            k /= prime[track]
        track += 1
    if k != 1:
        count += 1
    print count
